questions:
What situation does the photo depict?
A) A bird flying in sky
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A building
C) A bird in flight
D) A tree

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A bird in flight
C) A person walking
D) A lake

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A city skyline
C) The sky
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A bird
B) A flower
C) Grass
D) A tree

What can be seen on the right side of the photo?
A) A building
B) A tree with autumn leaves
C) A river
D) A mountain

What kind of bird is in the photo?
A) A parrot
B) A hawk or eagle
C) A penguin
D) A sparrow

What colors dominate the photo?
A) Green and brown
B) Blue, black, brown and green
C) Red and yellow
D) Black and white

What is the bird doing in the photo?
A) Perching on a branch
B) Flying in the sky
C) Eating
D) Swimming

What part of the bird is most visible in the photo?
A) Its beak
B) Its wings and tail
C) Its feet
D) Its tail

How many birds are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the bird's position in the sky?
A) Near the horizon
B) High in the sky
C) Close to the ground
D) In the clouds

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Taken from above
B) Taken from below
C) Taken at eye level
D) Taken from the side

What part of the tree is visible in the photo?
A) The trunk
B) The roots
C) The branches with leaves
D) The entire tree

How does the bird appear in the photo?
A) Stationary
B) In motion
C) Blurry
D) Close-up

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Grey
B) Blue
C) Pink
D) Orange

What is the visual effect of the sky in the photo?
A) It creates a sense of vastness
B) It makes the scene look crowded
C) It adds a gloomy tone
D) It emphasizes the urban setting

What is the primary color of the bird?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Black or dark brown
D) White

What is the bird's orientation in the photo?
A) Facing the camera
B) Facing away from the camera
C) Side profile
D) Upside down

What is the bird's wingspan in the photo?
A) Narrow
B) Wide
C) Closed
D) Partially open

How does the bird contrast with the sky?
A) It blends in
B) It stands out clearly
C) It is camouflaged
D) It is silhouetted

What is the bird's activity level in the photo?
A) Resting
B) Active
C) Sleeping
D) Eating

What is the primary focus of the photo?
A) The landscape
B) The bird
C) The tree
D) The sky

What is the bird's position relative to the tree?
A) Above the tree
B) Below the tree
C) On the tree
D) Next to the tree

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright and sunny
B) Dim and overcast
C) Artificial lighting
D) Nighttime lighting

How does the bird appear against the sky?
A) Blurry
B) Sharp and clear
C) Faded
D) Colorful

What is the main element that adds depth to the photo?
A) The bird's position in the sky
B) The tree on the side
C) The color of the sky
D) The lighting conditions
